text:
Hey folks!
I'm pretty new and don't really know if here's the right spot to post this. I've been a copywriter and brand Strategist for quite some time now, I've overtime groomed up a work team as means to reducing my workload and staying productive however, I've been doing all this through freelance platforms which haven't landed me much success especially in boasting my earnings yet as I often take on meager and ridiculous rates probably to build a great portfolio and clientele. 

At this point I'm actually looking at moving away to some other channels that can help me
land good and better paying clients. - I mean more direct client facing platforms without middle men.

I think I produce great stuff when it comes to copywriting and branding but so funny there have been times I've to charge peanuts to create an entire website content.
Here's one of my stuff attached:
1. <http://www.ndpifoundation.org|http://www.ndpifoundation.org>
What do you think is the way forward?

 I'm open to your ideas and advise

text: I think you need some great explaining to do to both your boss as well as the other subordinates. AI is actually meant to be a work assist mechanism and nothing more. If that's not carefully addressed it'll sure drain their productivity as well as their creative human edge
